snippet: Ryan, the coach of the Jets, was fined $100,000 on Friday for using a profanity that was picked up on video Sunday after the Jets beat the visiting Steelers.
abstract: NFL Roundup; New York Jets coach Rex Ryan is fined $100,000 for using a profanity that was picked up on video during game against the Pittsburgh Steelers; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Ryan, the coach of the Jets, was fined $100,000 on Friday for using a profanity that was picked up on video Sunday after the Jets beat the visiting Steelers.

headline.main: As Repeat Offender, Jets’ Ryan Gets 6-Figure Fine for Yelling 4-Letter Word
headline.print_headline: As Repeat Offender, Jets’ Ryan Receives a Six-Figure Fine for Yelling a Four-Letter Word
